title: What is the criteria for a leaverbuster low prio queue.
body:
Ive had games where i literally dc 20 times and not gotten low prio 5 games in a row.

But according to my last game the leaver buster is so severe that if i so much as alt tab for a minute or so every few minutes to reply to something i get put in low-prio? despite never actually leaving the game.

So its very confusing to say the least.

replies.body: You don't have to actually leave a game to get an LPQ, AFKing works too.

Thing is i wasnt afk though, i was just alt tabbed replying to messages.

Hell i topped the team for most ascension points so technically my contribution was above average too.

And like i said ive had times where telstra gave me a hard dicking and would dc me every game i played half way through the game meaning i effectively had a 20 minute afk in 5 games in a row (at which point i said fuck it this isnt getting any better ima play something else) and didnt get punished.
